REST API repository Contacts¶

async src.repository.contacts.create_contact(body: ContactModel, db: AsyncSession, user: User) → Contact¶

Creating contact in db.

Parameters:

  • ContactModel (ContactModel) – The ContactModel of contact to add.

  • db (Session) – The database session.

Returns:

A new ContactModel .

Return type:

Contact

async src.repository.contacts.find_contacts(contacts_find_data: str, db: AsyncSession, user: User) → Contact | None¶

Retrieves a list of contacts for a specific user with specified pagination parameters.

Parameters:

  • skip (int) – The number of contacts to skip.

  • limit (int) – The maximum number of contacts to return.

  • user (User) – The user to retrieve contacts for.

  • db (Session) – The database session.

Returns:

A list of contacts.

Return type:

List[Contacts]

async src.repository.contacts.find_contacts_by_birthday_month_and_day(db: AsyncSession, month: int, day: int) → list¶

Retrieves a list of contacts were birthday in month:day.

Parameters:

  • day (int) – The day of birthdays.

  • month (int) – The month of birthdays.

  • db (Session) – The database session.

Returns:

A list of contacts in that day.

Return type:

List[Contacts]

async src.repository.contacts.find_contacts_delta_time(contact_find_days: int, db: AsyncSession, user: User) → List[Contact]¶

Retrieves a list of contacts in clothers days range.

Parameters:

  • contact_find_days (int) – The number of days to birthdays period.

  • db (Session) – The database session.

Returns:

A list of contacts.

Return type:

List[Contacts]

async src.repository.contacts.get_all_contacts(skip: int, limit: int, db: AsyncSession) → List[Contact]¶

Retrieves a list of contacts for a specific user with specified pagination parameters.

Parameters:

  • skip (int) – The number of contacts to skip.

  • limit (int) – The maximum number of contacts to return.

  • user (User) – The user to retrieve contacts for.

  • db (Session) – The database session.

Returns:

A list of contacts.

Return type:

List[Contacts]

async src.repository.contacts.get_contact(contact_id: int, db: AsyncSession, user: User) → Contact | None¶

Retrieves contact for the user with specified parameters.

Parameters:

  • contact_id (in) – The id of contact.

  • db (Session) – The database session.

Returns:

A Contact if exist in db.

Return type:

Contact | None

async src.repository.contacts.get_contacts(skip: int, limit: int, db: AsyncSession, user: User) → List[Contact]¶

Retrieves a list of contacts for a specific user with specified pagination parameters.

Parameters:

  • skip (int) – The number of contacts to skip.

  • limit (int) – The maximum number of contacts to return.

  • user (User) – The user to retrieve contacts for.

  • db (Session) – The database session.

Returns:

A list of contacts.

Return type:

List[Contacts]

async src.repository.contacts.remove_contact(contact_id: int, db: AsyncSession, user: User)¶

Deleting contact from db.

Parameters:

  • contact_id (int) – The contact_id of contacts to del.

  • db (Session) – The database session.

Returns:

A deleted ContactModel .

Return type:

ContactModel

Updating contact in db.

Parameters:

  • ContactModel (ContactModel) – The ContactModel of contact to change.

  • db (Session) – The database session.

Returns:

A ContactModel .

Contact|None

REST API repository Users¶

async src.repository.users.get_user_by_mail(mail: str, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)) → User¶

Retrieves a single user with the specified email for a specific user.

Parameters:

  • mail (string) – The mail of the user to retrieve.

  • db (Session) – The database session.

Returns:

The note with the specified ID, or None if it does not exist.

Return type:

User | None
